verses.verse: Forasmuch then as <S%G3767><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> arm <S%G3695><s%> yourselves <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with the same <S%G846><s%> mind; <S%G1771><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he who has suffered <S%G3958><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> has ceased <S%G3973><s%> from sin; <S%G266><s%>

that <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G980><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> should live <S%G980><s%> the rest <S%G1954><s%> of <S%G5550><s%> your time <S%G5550><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> for the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> for the will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have spent <S%G979><s%> enough <S%G713><s%> of our <S%G2254><s%> past <S%G3928><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> doing <S%G2716><s%> the desire <S%G2307><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and having walked <S%G4198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> lewdness, <S%G766><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%> drunken binges, <S%G3632><s%> orgies, <S%G2970><s%> carousings, <S%G4224><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abominable <S%G111><s%> idolatries. <S%G1495><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> They think it is strange <S%G3579><s%> that you <S%G5216><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> run <S%G4936><s%> with <S%G1519><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> excess <S%G401><s%> of riot, <S%G810><s%> blaspheming: <S%G987><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> will give <S%G591><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> to him who is <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> the Good News was preached <S%G2097><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to the dead, <S%G3498><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might be judged <S%G2919><s%> indeed as <S%G2596><s%> men <S%G444><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> as to <S%G2596><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in the spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> is near. <S%G1448><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> be of sound mind, <S%G4993><s%> self-controlled, <S%G3525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sober <S%G4993><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> prayer. <S%G4335><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> be <S%G2192><s%> earnest <S%G1618><s%> in your love <S%G26><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> love <S%G26><s%> covers <S%G2572><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>
Be hospitable <S%G5382><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> without <S%G427><s%> grumbling. <S%G1112><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> has received <S%G2983><s%> a gift, <S%G5486><s%> employ <S%G1247><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in serving one <S%G1519><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> managers <S%G3623><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in its various forms. <S%G4164><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> speaks, <S%G2980><s%> let it be as <S%G5613><s%> it were the very words <S%G3051><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> serves, <S%G1247><s%> let it be as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the strength <S%G2479><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> supplies, <S%G5524><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> belong <S%G2076><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dominion <S%G2904><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G3579><s%> astonished <S%G3579><s%> at <S%G5213><s%> the fiery trial <S%G4451><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> has come upon you, <S%G5213><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> test <S%G3986><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> as though a strange thing <S%G3581><s%> happened <S%G4819><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> because <S%G2526><s%> you are partakers <S%G2841><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> rejoice; <S%G5463><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> may rejoice <S%G5463><s%> with exceeding joy. <S%G21><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> you are insulted <S%G3679><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> you are blessed; <S%G3107><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> rests <S%G373><s%> on <S%G2596><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> On <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> part <S%G2596><s%> he is blasphemed, <S%G987><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> on <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G5209><s%> part <S%G2596><s%> he is glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> let <S%G3958><s%> none <S%G3361><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> murderer, <S%G5406><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a thief, <S%G2812><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an evil doer, <S%G2555><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G5613><s%> a meddler in other men <S%G244><s%>'s matters.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> one of you suffers <S%G5613><s%> for being a Christian, <S%G5546><s%> let him <S%G153><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be ashamed; <S%G153><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> let him glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> matter. <S%G3313><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> has come for judgment <S%G2917><s%> to begin <S%G756><s%> with <S%G575><s%> the household <S%G3624><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1161><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> it begins first <S%G4412><s%> with <S%G575><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will happen <S%G5056><s%> to those who don't <S%G544><s%> obey the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> it is hard <S%G3433><s%> for the righteous <S%G1342><s%> to be saved, <S%G4982><s%> what <S%G4226><s%> will <S%G5316><s%> happen <S%G5316><s%> to the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sinner? <S%G268><s%>"

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> let them also who suffer <S%G3958><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> doing <S%G16><s%> good entrust <S%G3908><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> to him, <S%G5613><s%> as to a faithful <S%G4103><s%> Creator. <S%G2939><s%>
